remarks: If the sum of two atoms cover the zero subspace, they are equal. ( ~ atcv0eq analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lsatcv0eq.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatcv0eq.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lsatcv0eq.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatcv0eq.c $e |- C = ( <oL ` W ) $.
lsatcv0eq.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatcv0eq.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
lsatcv0eq.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. A ) $.
lsatcv0eq $p |- ( ph -> ( { .0. } C ( Q .(+) R ) <-> Q = R ) ) $.
